label: unique_ID
guidance: Field REQUIRED for ALL sample submission. Options: IGSN- http://www.geosamples.org/getigsn ; UUID- https://www.uuidgenerator.net/

label: samp_name
guidance: ID that is present on the shipped sample. Human readable.

label: investigation_type
guidance: This field is constrained to contain only a set of limited terms (listed under Expected value) that indicate the types of data that were generated. Include all the data types, this field can have multiple values separated by a ;

label: source_mat_id
guidance: A unique identifier assigned to an original material sample collected or to any derived sub-samples. The source material should be listed as a sample to inform details about parent material relationship.

label: growth_facil
guidance: Type of facility or location form where the sample was harvested

label: store_cond
guidance: Informs how your sample was stored

label: geo_loc_name
examples: country or sea name; region or state; specific location

label: samp_collect_device
guidance: Report dimensions and details when applicable

label: antibiotic_regm
examples: antibiotic name {text} ;antibiotic amount {float} {unit} ;treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: chem_mutagen
examples: mutagen name {text};mutagen amount {float} {unit};treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: fertilizer_regm
examples: fertilizer name{text}; fertilizer amount {float} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: fungicide_regm
examples: fungicide name {text}; fungicide amount {float} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: gravity
examples: gravity factor value {float} {unit};treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: growth_hormone_regm
examples: growth hormone name {text}; growth hormone amount {text} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: herbicide_regm
examples: herbicide name {text}; herbicide amount {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: host_disease_stat
examples: disease name or Disease Ontology term {text}|{termLabel} {[termID]}

label: mineral_nutr_regm
examples: mineral nutrient name {text}; mineral nutrient amount {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: non_min_nutr_regm
examples: non-mineral nutrient name {text}; non-mineral nutrient amount {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: perturbation
examples: perturbation type name {text}; perturbation interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: pesticide_regm
examples: pesticide name {text}; pesticide amount {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: plant_growth_med
examples: {termLabel} {[termID]} or [husk|other artificial liquid medium|other artificial solid medium|peat moss|perlite|pumice|sand|soil|vermiculite|water]

label: radiation_regm
examples: radiation type name {text}; radiation amount {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: rainfall_regm
examples: measurement value {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: salt_regm
examples: salt name {text}; salt amount {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: season_environment
examples: seasonal environment name {text}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: standing_water_regm
examples: standing water type {text}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: water_temp_regm
examples: measurement value {value} {unit}; treatment interval and duration {Rn/start_time/end_time/duration}

label: active surveillance in response to an outbreak
active surveillance not initiated by an outbreak
